Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Injured on 4/13/2015 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/3/2016 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/6/2016, off Jeffrey Horne (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2016, off Zachary Carrero (COL)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Atlanta on 7/15/2016...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2016, hitting .295 with 28 HR, 95 RBI...
Traded from Detroit to New York on 3/2/2018 (Going to DET: P Tony Delrosario, 2B Grant Dear, 1B Gregory Lovato, P Leonard Howland. Going to NY: 2B Raymond Yasutoki)...
Injured on 6/18/2018 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,328,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/6/2019 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2019, hitting .375 with 7 HR, 22 RBI...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,064,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2020, hitting .545 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2020, hitting .378 with 6 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/22/2020 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,064,286 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/4/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/9/2022 to a 6-year deal worth $26,338,307 per year...
Hit 3 homeruns against Atlanta, driving in 4 runs on 6/27/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2022, hitting .471 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Brooklyn on 7/4/2022...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2023, hitting .366 with 7 HR, 34 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
